Attribute.Name: isolation and growth condition
Attribute.Description: Publication reference in the form of pubmed ID, DOI or URL for isolation and growth condition specifications of the organism/material
Attribute.DescriptionJa: 単離や生育条件の詳細を記載している pubmed ID，DOI， あるいは URL

Attribute.Name: latitude and longitude
Attribute.Description: The geographical coordinates of the location where the sample was collected. Specify as decimal degrees latitude and longitude in format "d[d.dddd] N|S d[dd.dddd] W|E", eg, 47.94 N 28.12 W
Attribute.DescriptionJa: サンプルが採取された位置の地理的座標。 (書式：d[d.dddd] N|S d[dd.dddd] W|E) (例: 47.94 N 28.12 W) 小数点以下の数字は分秒ではなく小数で記載してください。

Attribute.Name: barometric pressure
Attribute.Description: force per unit area exerted against a surface by the weight of air above that surface

Attribute.Name: observed biotic relationship
Attribute.Description: Free-living or from host (define relationship)

Attribute.Name: carbon dioxide
Attribute.Description: carbon dioxide (gas) amount or concentration at the time of sampling

Attribute.Name: carbon monoxide
Attribute.Description: carbon monoxide (gas) amount or concentration at the time of sampling

Attribute.Name: chemical administration
Attribute.Description: list of chemical compounds administered to the host or site where sampling occurred, and when (e.g. antibiotics, N fertilizer, air filter); can include multiple compounds. For Chemical Entities of Biological Interest ontology (CHEBI) (v1.72), please see http://bioportal.bioontology.org/visualize/44603

Attribute.Name: elevation
Attribute.Description: The elevation of the sampling site as measured by the vertical distance from mean sea level.
Attribute.DescriptionJa: サンプルを採取した場所の標高。平均海面からの垂直距離。

Attribute.Name: extrachromosomal elements
Attribute.Description: Plasmids that have significance phenotypic consequence

Attribute.Name: humidity
Attribute.Description: amount of water vapour in the air, at the time of sampling

Attribute.Name: isolation source
Attribute.Description: Describes the physical, environmental and/or local geographical source of the biological sample from which the sample was derived.
Attribute.DescriptionJa: サンプルが得られた生物学的サンプルに関する，物理的，環境的，かつまたは，地理的な由来

Attribute.Name: methane
Attribute.Description: methane (gas) amount or concentration at the time of sampling

Attribute.Name: miscellaneous parameter
Attribute.Description: any other measurement performed or parameter collected, that is not listed here

Attribute.Name: organism count
Attribute.Description: total count of any organism per gram or volume of sample, should include name of organism followed by count; can include multiple organism counts

Attribute.Name: oxygenation status of sample
Attribute.Description: oxygenation status of sample

Attribute.Name: oxygen
Attribute.Description: oxygen (gas) amount or concentration at the time of sampling

Attribute.Name: perturbation
Attribute.Description: type of perturbation, e.g. chemical administration, physical disturbance, etc., coupled with time that perturbation occurred; can include multiple perturbation types

Attribute.Name: pollutants
Attribute.Description: pollutant types and, amount or concentrations measured at the time of sampling; can report multiple pollutants by entering numeric values preceded by name of pollutant

Attribute.Name: relationship to oxygen
Attribute.Description: Aerobic or anaerobic

Attribute.Name: respirable particulate matter
Attribute.Description: concentration of substances that remain suspended in the air, and comprise mixtures of organic and inorganic substances (PM10 and PM2.5); can report multiple PM's by entering numeric values preceded by name of PM

Attribute.Name: sample collection device or method
Attribute.Description: Method or device employed for collecting sample

Attribute.Name: sample material processing
Attribute.Description: Processing applied to the sample during or after isolation

Attribute.Name: sample salinity
Attribute.Description: salinity of sample, i.e. measure of total salt concentration

Attribute.Name: sample size
Attribute.Description: Amount or size of sample (volume, mass or area) that was collected

Attribute.Name: sample storage duration
Attribute.Description: duration for which sample was stored

Attribute.Name: sample storage location
Attribute.Description: location at which sample was stored, usually name of a specific freezer/room

Attribute.Name: sample storage temperature
Attribute.Description: temperature at which sample was stored, e.g. -80

Attribute.Name: sample volume or weight for DNA extraction
Attribute.Description: volume (mL) or weight (g) of sample processed for DNA extraction

Attribute.Name: solar irradiance
Attribute.Description: the amount of solar energy that arrives at a specific area of a surface during a specific time interval

Attribute.Name: source material identifiers
Attribute.Description: unique identifier assigned to a material sample used for extracting nucleic acids, and subsequent sequencing. The identifier can refer either to the original material collected or to any derived sub-samples.
Attribute.DescriptionJa: 核酸抽出とシークエンスに使用された実験材料に対する ID。採取された元々の材料，もしくは，そこから派生したサンプルを参照する ID を記載することができます。

Attribute.Name: subspecific genetic lineage
Attribute.Description: Information about the genetic distinctness of the lineage (eg., biovar, serovar)

Attribute.Name: Fhost
Attribute.Description: temperature of the sample at time of sampling

Attribute.Name: trophic level
Attribute.Description: Feeding position in food chain (eg., chemolithotroph)

Attribute.Name: ventilation rate
Attribute.Description: ventilation rate of the system in the sampled premises

Attribute.Name: ventilation type
Attribute.Description: ventilation system used in the sampled premises

Attribute.Name: volatile organic compounds
Attribute.Description: concentration of carbon-based chemicals that easily evaporate at room temperature; can report multiple volatile organic compounds by entering numeric values preceded by name of compound

Attribute.Name: wind direction
Attribute.Description: wind direction is the direction from which a wind originates

Attribute.Name: wind speed
Attribute.Description: speed of wind measured at the time of sampling

Attribute.Name: sample name
Attribute.Description: The sample name is a name that you choose for the sample, it works as an ID. Each sample name must be unique in samples submitted from a submission account.
Attribute.DescriptionJa: sample name は登録者がサンプルに付ける名前で ID として機能します。sample name は Submission においてユニークである必要があります。

Attribute.Name: sample title
Attribute.Description: Sample title should be short and informative. Each sample title must be unique in a submission. Examples: 1) Escherichia coli O104:H4 str. C227-11 clinical isolate 2010_333_NC-6; 2) CD8+ T cells from female TSG6-knockout BALB/c mouse; 3) Human metagenome isolated from urine of healthy female.
Attribute.DescriptionJa: タイトルはサンプルをよく表す簡潔なものを記入します。 タイトルはアカウントから登録されたサンプルにおいてユニークである必要があります。 例: 1) Escherichia coli O104:H4 str. C227-11 clinical isolate 2010_333_NC-6; 2) CD8+ T cells from female TSG6-knockout BALB/c mouse; 3) Human metagenome isolated from urine of healthy female.

Attribute.Name: description
Attribute.Description: A brief description for the sample.
Attribute.DescriptionJa: サンプルに対する簡潔な補足情報。

Attribute.Name: organism
Attribute.Description: The most descriptive organism name for this sample (to the species, if relevant) in the NCBI Taxonomy database, http://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/taxonomy If it is not in the database, provide as much information about the organism as possible and the DDBJ staff apply a new organism name to NCBI Taxonomy.
Attribute.DescriptionJa: NCBI Taxonomy database，http://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/taxonomy に登録されている最も下位のランクの生物名 (適切な場合は species まで)。データベースに登録されていない場合，未登録の生物に関する情報をできるだけ記入してください。 DDBJ スタッフが NCBI Taxonomy に未登録の生物を申請します。

Attribute.Name: taxonomy id
Attribute.Description: NCBI Taxonomy identifier. This is appropriate for individual organisms, some metagenomes and environmental samples (http://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/Taxonomy/Browser/wwwtax.cgi?mode=Undef&id=12908&lvl=3&lin=f&keep=1&srchmode=1&unlock). If it is not in the database, enter a tentative ID (e.g., 1). The DDBJ staff apply a new organism name to NCBI Taxonomy, and then the tentative ID is replaced by an assigned TaxID.

Attribute.Name: bioproject accession
Attribute.Description: Associated BioProject accession number (PRJDB)
Attribute.DescriptionJa: 関連する BioProject アクセッション番号 (PRJDB)

Attribute.Name: strain
Attribute.Description: microbial or eukaryotic strain name
Attribute.DescriptionJa: 微生物や真核生物の株名。

Attribute.Name: isolate
Attribute.Description: Identification or description of the specific individual from which this sample was obtained
Attribute.DescriptionJa: サンプルの得られた individual isolate

Attribute.Name: cultivar
Attribute.Description: Cultivar name - cultivated variety of plant
Attribute.DescriptionJa: 植物の栽培品種名。

Attribute.Name: ecotype
Attribute.Description: a population within a given species displaying genetically based, phenotypic traits that reflect adaptation to a local habitat, e.g., Columbia

Attribute.Name: absolute air humidity
Attribute.Description: actual mass of water vapor - mh20 - present in the air water vapor mixture

Attribute.Name: air temperature
Attribute.Description: temperature of the air at the time of sampling

Attribute.Name: building occupancy type
Attribute.Description: primary function for which a building or discrete part of a building is intended to be used

Attribute.Name: building setting
Attribute.Description: location (geography) where a building is set

Attribute.Name: carbon dioxide
Attribute.Description: carbon dioxide (gas) amount or concentration at the time of sampling

Attribute.Name: environment biome
Attribute.Description: Descriptor of the broad ecological context of a sample. Examples include: desert, taiga or deciduous woodland. FAQ, http://trace.ddbj.nig.ac.jp/biosample/faq_e.html#biome-feature-material EnvO (v 2013-06-14) terms can be found via the link: http://www.environmentontology.org/Browse-EnvO
Attribute.DescriptionJa: サンプルに関する広い生態学的な環境。例: desert，taiga，deciduous woodland。FAQ，http://trace.ddbj.nig.ac.jp/biosample/faq.html#biome-feature-material EnvO (v 2013-06-14) 用語は次のリストから探すことができます: http://www.environmentontology.org/Browse-EnvO

Attribute.Name: environment feature
Attribute.Description: Descriptor of the local environment. Examples include: harbor, cliff, or lake. FAQ, http://trace.ddbj.nig.ac.jp/biosample/faq_e.html#biome-feature-material EnvO (v 2013-06-14) terms can be found via the link: http://www.environmentontology.org/Browse-EnvO
Attribute.DescriptionJa: 局所的な環境。例：harbor，cliff，lake。FAQ，http://trace.ddbj.nig.ac.jp/biosample/faq.html#biome-feature-material EnvO (v 2013-06-14) 用語は次のリストから探すことができます: http://www.environmentontology.org/Browse-EnvO

Attribute.Name: environment material
Attribute.Description: Material that was displaced by the sample, or material in which a sample was embedded, prior to the sampling event. Examples include: air, soil, or water. FAQ, http://trace.ddbj.nig.ac.jp/biosample/faq_e.html#biome-feature-material EnvO (v 2013-06-14) terms can be found via the link: http://www.environmentontology.org/Browse-EnvO
Attribute.DescriptionJa: サンプリングする前、サンプルによって置換されていた物質やサンプルが埋め込まれていた物質。例: air，soil，water。FAQ，http://trace.ddbj.nig.ac.jp/biosample/faq.html#biome-feature-material EnvO (v 2013-06-14) 用語は次のリストから探すことができます: http://www.environmentontology.org/Browse-EnvO

Attribute.Name: filter type
Attribute.Description: device which removes solid particulates or airborne molecular contaminants

Attribute.Name: geographic location
Attribute.Description: Geographical origin of the sample; use the appropriate name from the list, http://www.ddbj.nig.ac.jp/sub/country-e.html. Use a colon to separate the country or ocean from more detailed information about the location, eg "Japan:Kanagawa, Hakone, Lake Ashi"
Attribute.DescriptionJa: サンプルを得た地域。国，大洋，または，海，の名称を次のリストから選択します，http://www.ddbj.nig.ac.jp/sub/country-e.html コロンに続けて地方・地域を示します。 例：Japan:Kanagawa，Hakone，Lake Ashi

Attribute.Name: heating and cooling system type
Attribute.Description: methods of conditioning or heating a room or building

Attribute.Name: indoor space
Attribute.Description: a distinguishable space within a structure, the purpose for which discrete areas of a building is used

Attribute.Name: isolation and growth condition
Attribute.Description: Publication reference in the form of pubmed ID, DOI or URL for isolation and growth condition specifications of the organism/material
Attribute.DescriptionJa: 単離や生育条件の詳細を記載している pubmed ID，DOI， あるいは URL

Attribute.Name: latitude and longitude
Attribute.Description: The geographical coordinates of the location where the sample was collected. Specify as decimal degrees latitude and longitude in format "d[d.dddd] N|S d[dd.dddd] W|E", eg, 47.94 N 28.12 W
Attribute.DescriptionJa: サンプルが採取された位置の地理的座標。 (書式：d[d.dddd] N|S d[dd.dddd] W|E) (例: 47.94 N 28.12 W) 小数点以下の数字は分秒ではなく小数で記載してください。

Attribute.Name: light type
Attribute.Description: application of light to achieve some practical or aesthetic effect. Lighting includes the use of both artificial light sources such as lamps and light fixtures, as well as natural illumination by capturing daylight. Can also include absence of light

Attribute.Name: occupancy at sampling
Attribute.Description: number of occupants present at time of sample within the given space

Attribute.Name: occupant density at sampling
Attribute.Description: average number of occupants at time of sampling per square footage

Attribute.Name: organism count
Attribute.Description: total count of any organism per gram or volume of sample, should include name of organism followed by count; can include multiple organism counts

Attribute.Name: relative air humidity
Attribute.Description: partial vapor and air pressure, density of the vapor and air, or by the actual mass of the vapor and air

Attribute.Name: space typical state
Attribute.Description: customary or normal state of the space

Attribute.Name: typical occupant density
Attribute.Description: customary or normal density of occupants

Attribute.Name: ventilation type
Attribute.Description: ventilation system used in the sampled premises

Attribute.Name: observed biotic relationship
Attribute.Description: Free-living or from host (define relationship)

Attribute.Name: dew point
Attribute.Description: temperature to which a given parcel of humid air must be cooled, at constant barometric pressure, for water vapor to condense into water.

Attribute.Name: extrachromosomal elements
Attribute.Description: Plasmids that have significance phenotypic consequence

Attribute.Name: indoor surface
Attribute.Description: type of indoor surface

Attribute.Name: isolation source
Attribute.Description: Describes the physical, environmental and/or local geographical source of the biological sample from which the sample was derived.
Attribute.DescriptionJa: サンプルが得られた生物学的サンプルに関する，物理的，環境的，かつまたは，地理的な由来

Attribute.Name: relationship to oxygen
Attribute.Description: Aerobic or anaerobic

Attribute.Name: sample collection device or method
Attribute.Description: Method or device employed for collecting sample

Attribute.Name: sample material processing
Attribute.Description: Processing applied to the sample during or after isolation

Attribute.Name: sample size
Attribute.Description: Amount or size of sample (volume, mass or area) that was collected

Attribute.Name: sample size sorting method
Attribute.Description: method by which samples are sorted

Attribute.Name: sample volume or weight for DNA extraction
Attribute.Description: volume (mL) or weight (g) of sample processed for DNA extraction

Attribute.Name: source material identifiers
Attribute.Description: unique identifier assigned to a material sample used for extracting nucleic acids, and subsequent sequencing. The identifier can refer either to the original material collected or to any derived sub-samples.
Attribute.DescriptionJa: 核酸抽出とシークエンスに使用された実験材料に対する ID。採取された元々の材料，もしくは，そこから派生したサンプルを参照する ID を記載することができます。

Attribute.Name: subspecific genetic lineage
Attribute.Description: Information about the genetic distinctness of the lineage (eg., biovar, serovar)

Attribute.Name: substructure type
Attribute.Description: substructure or under building is that largely hidden section of the building which is built off the foundations to the ground floor level

Attribute.Name: surface-air contaminant
Attribute.Description: contaminant identified on surface

Attribute.Name: surface humidity
Attribute.Description: surfaces: water activity as a function of air and material moisture

Attribute.Name: surface material
Attribute.Description: surface materials at the point of sampling

Attribute.Name: surface moisture
Attribute.Description: water held on a surface

Attribute.Name: surface moisture pH
Attribute.Description: pH measurement of surface

Attribute.Name: surface temperature
Attribute.Description: temperature of the surface at the time of sampling

Attribute.Name: trophic level
Attribute.Description: Feeding position in food chain (eg., chemolithotroph)

Attribute.Name: sample name
Attribute.Description: The sample name is a name that you choose for the sample, it works as an ID. Each sample name must be unique in samples submitted from a submission account.
Attribute.DescriptionJa: sample name は登録者がサンプルに付ける名前で ID として機能します。sample name は Submission においてユニークである必要があります。

Attribute.Name: sample title
Attribute.Description: Sample title should be short and informative. Each sample title must be unique in a submission. Examples: 1) Escherichia coli O104:H4 str. C227-11 clinical isolate 2010_333_NC-6; 2) CD8+ T cells from female TSG6-knockout BALB/c mouse; 3) Human metagenome isolated from urine of healthy female.

Attribute.Name: description
Attribute.Description: A brief description for the sample.
Attribute.DescriptionJa: サンプルに対する簡潔な補足情報。

Attribute.Name: organism
Attribute.Description: The most descriptive organism name for this sample (to the species, if relevant) in the NCBI Taxonomy database, http://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/taxonomy If it is not in the database, provide as much information about the organism as possible and the DDBJ staff apply a new organism name to NCBI Taxonomy.
Attribute.DescriptionJa: NCBI Taxonomy database，http://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/taxonomy に登録されている最も下位のランクの生物名 (適切な場合は species まで)。データベースに登録されていない場合，未登録の生物に関する情報をできるだけ記入してください。 DDBJ スタッフが NCBI Taxonomy に未登録の生物を申請します。

Attribute.Name: taxonomy id
Attribute.Description: NCBI Taxonomy identifier. This is appropriate for individual organisms, some metagenomes and environmental samples (http://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/Taxonomy/Browser/wwwtax.cgi?mode=Undef&id=12908&lvl=3&lin=f&keep=1&srchmode=1&unlock). If it is not in the database, enter a tentative ID (e.g., 1). The DDBJ staff apply a new organism name to NCBI Taxonomy, and then the tentative ID is replaced by an assigned TaxID.

Attribute.Name: bioproject accession
Attribute.Description: Associated BioProject accession number (PRJDB)
Attribute.DescriptionJa: 関連する BioProject アクセッション番号 (PRJDB)

Attribute.Name: strain
Attribute.Description: microbial or eukaryotic strain name
Attribute.DescriptionJa: 微生物や真核生物の株名。

Attribute.Name: isolate
Attribute.Description: Identification or description of the specific individual from which this sample was obtained
Attribute.DescriptionJa: サンプルの得られた individual isolate

Attribute.Name: cultivar
Attribute.Description: Cultivar name - cultivated variety of plant
Attribute.DescriptionJa: 植物の栽培品種名。

Attribute.Name: ecotype
Attribute.Description: a population within a given species displaying genetically based, phenotypic traits that reflect adaptation to a local habitat, e.g., Columbia

Attribute.Name: environment biome
Attribute.Description: Descriptor of the broad ecological context of a sample. Examples include: desert, taiga or deciduous woodland. FAQ, http://trace.ddbj.nig.ac.jp/biosample/faq_e.html#biome-feature-material EnvO (v 2013-06-14) terms can be found via the link: http://www.environmentontology.org/Browse-EnvO
Attribute.DescriptionJa: サンプルに関する広い生態学的な環境。例: desert，taiga，deciduous woodland。FAQ，http://trace.ddbj.nig.ac.jp/biosample/faq.html#biome-feature-material EnvO (v 2013-06-14) 用語は次のリストから探すことができます: http://www.environmentontology.org/Browse-EnvO

Attribute.Name: environment feature
Attribute.Description: Descriptor of the local environment. Examples include: harbor, cliff, or lake. FAQ, http://trace.ddbj.nig.ac.jp/biosample/faq_e.html#biome-feature-material EnvO (v 2013-06-14) terms can be found via the link: http://www.environmentontology.org/Browse-EnvO
Attribute.DescriptionJa: 局所的な環境。例：harbor，cliff，lake。FAQ，http://trace.ddbj.nig.ac.jp/biosample/faq.html#biome-feature-material EnvO (v 2013-06-14) 用語は次のリストから探すことができます: http://www.environmentontology.org/Browse-EnvO

Attribute.Name: environment material
Attribute.Description: Material that was displaced by the sample, or material in which a sample was embedded, prior to the sampling event. Examples include: air, soil, or water. FAQ, http://trace.ddbj.nig.ac.jp/biosample/faq_e.html#biome-feature-material EnvO (v 2013-06-14) terms can be found via the link: http://www.environmentontology.org/Browse-EnvO
Attribute.DescriptionJa: サンプリングする前、サンプルによって置換されていた物質やサンプルが埋め込まれていた物質。例: air，soil，water。FAQ，http://trace.ddbj.nig.ac.jp/biosample/faq.html#biome-feature-material EnvO (v 2013-06-14) 用語は次のリストから探すことができます: http://www.environmentontology.org/Browse-EnvO

Attribute.Name: geographic location
Attribute.Description: Geographical origin of the sample; use the appropriate name from the list, http://www.ddbj.nig.ac.jp/sub/country-e.html. Use a colon to separate the country or ocean from more detailed information about the location, eg "Japan:Kanagawa, Hakone, Lake Ashi"
Attribute.DescriptionJa: サンプルを得た地域。国，大洋，または，海，の名称を次のリストから選択します，http://www.ddbj.nig.ac.jp/sub/country-e.html コロンに続けて地方・地域を示します。 例：Japan:Kanagawa，Hakone，Lake Ashi

Attribute.Name: host
Attribute.Description: The natural (as opposed to laboratory) host to the organism from which the sample was obtained. Use the full taxonomic name, eg, "Homo sapiens".
Attribute.DescriptionJa: サンプルが取得された生物の (ラボではなく) 自然界での宿主。"Homo sapiens" のように学名を記載。

Attribute.Name: isolation and growth condition
Attribute.Description: Publication reference in the form of pubmed ID, DOI or URL for isolation and growth condition specifications of the organism/material
Attribute.DescriptionJa: 単離や生育条件の詳細を記載している pubmed ID，DOI， あるいは URL

Attribute.Name: latitude and longitude
Attribute.Description: The geographical coordinates of the location where the sample was collected. Specify as decimal degrees latitude and longitude in format "d[d.dddd] N|S d[dd.dddd] W|E", eg, 47.94 N 28.12 W
Attribute.DescriptionJa: サンプルが採取された位置の地理的座標。 (書式：d[d.dddd] N|S d[dd.dddd] W|E) (例: 47.94 N 28.12 W) 小数点以下の数字は分秒ではなく小数で記載してください。

Attribute.Name: altitude
Attribute.Description: The altitude of the sample is the vertical distance between Earth's surface above Sea Level and the sampled position in the air.
Attribute.DescriptionJa: 海抜上の地表面から空中にあるサンプルを採取した位置までの垂直距離。

Attribute.Name: observed biotic relationship
Attribute.Description: Free-living or from host (define relationship)

Attribute.Name: chemical administration
Attribute.Description: list of chemical compounds administered to the host or site where sampling occurred, and when (e.g. antibiotics, N fertilizer, air filter); can include multiple compounds. For Chemical Entities of Biological Interest ontology (CHEBI) (v1.72), please see http://bioportal.bioontology.org/visualize/44603

Attribute.Name: depth
Attribute.Description: Depth is defined as the vertical distance below surface, e.g. for sediment or soil samples depth is measured from sediment or soil surface, respectively. Depth can be reported as an interval for subsurface samples.
Attribute.DescriptionJa: 水深・深度。局所表面下の垂直距離。例えば、堆積物や土壌サンプルの深度は堆積物や土壌の表面から測定される。深度は地下サンプルに対する距離として報告される。

Attribute.Name: elevation
Attribute.Description: The elevation of the sampling site as measured by the vertical distance from mean sea level.
Attribute.DescriptionJa: サンプルを採取した場所の標高。平均海面からの垂直距離。

Attribute.Name: extrachromosomal elements
Attribute.Description: Plasmids that have significance phenotypic consequence

Attribute.Name: gravidity
Attribute.Description: whether or not subject is gravid, and if yes date due or date post-conception, specifying which is used

Attribute.Name: host age
Attribute.Description: Age of host at the time of sampling
Attribute.DescriptionJa: サンプリング時の宿主の年齢

Attribute.Name: host blood pressure diastolic
Attribute.Description: resting diastolic blood pressureof the host, measured as mm mercury

Attribute.Name: host blood pressure systolic
Attribute.Description: resting systolic blood pressure of the host, measured as mm mercury

Attribute.Name: host body habitat
Attribute.Description: original body habitat where the sample was obtained from

Attribute.Name: host body product
Attribute.Description: substance produced by the host, e.g. stool, mucus, where the sample was obtained from

Attribute.Name: host body temperature
Attribute.Description: core body temperature of the host when sample was collected
Attribute.DescriptionJa: サンプルを採取した時の宿主の体温

Attribute.Name: host color
Attribute.Description: the color of host
Attribute.DescriptionJa: 宿主の色

Attribute.Name: host diet
Attribute.Description: type of diet depending on the sample for animals omnivore, herbivore etc., for humans high-fat, meditteranean etc.; can include multiple diet types

Attribute.Name: host disease
Attribute.Description: Name of relevant disease, e.g. Salmonella gastroenteritis. For the controlled vocabulary, please see Human Disease Ontology, http://bioportal.bioontology.org/ontologies/1009 or MeSH, http://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/mesh
Attribute.DescriptionJa: 宿主の病気の名称。(例：Salmonella gastroenteritis) Controlled vocabulary としては以下のオントロジーを参照: Human Disease Ontology，http://bioportal.bioontology.org/ontologies/1009，MeSH，http://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/mesh

Attribute.Name: host dry mass
Attribute.Description: measurement of dry mass

Attribute.Name: host growth conditions
Attribute.Description: literature reference giving growth conditions of the host

Attribute.Name: host height
Attribute.Description: the height of subject

Attribute.Name: host infra specific name
Attribute.Description: taxonomic information subspecies level

Attribute.Name: host infra specific rank
Attribute.Description: taxonomic rank information below subspecies level, such as variety, form, rank etc.

Attribute.Name: host last meal
Attribute.Description: content of last meal and time since feeding; can include multiple values

Attribute.Name: host length
Attribute.Description: the length of subject

Attribute.Name: host life stage
Attribute.Description: description of host life stage

Attribute.Name: host sex
Attribute.Description: Gender or physical sex of the host
Attribute.DescriptionJa: 宿主の性別

Attribute.Name: host shape
Attribute.Description: morphological shape of host
Attribute.DescriptionJa: 宿主の形態学的形状

Attribute.Name: host subject id
Attribute.Description: a unique identifier by which each subject can be referred to, de-identified, e.g. #131
Attribute.DescriptionJa: 宿主の匿名化されたユニーク ID

Attribute.Name: host substrate
Attribute.Description: the growth substrate of the host

Attribute.Name: host taxonomy ID
Attribute.Description: NCBI taxonomy ID of the host, e.g. 9606
Attribute.DescriptionJa: 宿主の NCBI Taxonomy identifier

Attribute.Name: host tissue sampled
Attribute.Description: Type of tissue the initial sample was taken from. Controlled vocabulary, http://bioportal.bioontology.org/ontologies/1005

Attribute.Name: host total mass
Attribute.Description: total mass of the host at collection, the unit depends on host

Attribute.Name: isolation source
Attribute.Description: Describes the physical, environmental and/or local geographical source of the biological sample from which the sample was derived.
Attribute.DescriptionJa: サンプルが得られた生物学的サンプルに関する，物理的，環境的，かつまたは，地理的な由来

Attribute.Name: miscellaneous parameter
Attribute.Description: any other measurement performed or parameter collected, that is not listed here

Attribute.Name: organism count
Attribute.Description: total count of any organism per gram or volume of sample, should include name of organism followed by count; can include multiple organism counts

Attribute.Name: oxygenation status of sample
Attribute.Description: oxygenation status of sample

Attribute.Name: perturbation
Attribute.Description: type of perturbation, e.g. chemical administration, physical disturbance, etc., coupled with time that perturbation occurred; can include multiple perturbation types

Attribute.Name: relationship to oxygen
Attribute.Description: Aerobic or anaerobic

Attribute.Name: sample collection device or method
Attribute.Description: Method or device employed for collecting sample

Attribute.Name: sample material processing
Attribute.Description: Processing applied to the sample during or after isolation

Attribute.Name: sample salinity
Attribute.Description: salinity of sample, i.e. measure of total salt concentration

Attribute.Name: sample size
Attribute.Description: Amount or size of sample (volume, mass or area) that was collected

Attribute.Name: sample storage duration
Attribute.Description: duration for which sample was stored

Attribute.Name: sample storage location
Attribute.Description: location at which sample was stored, usually name of a specific freezer/room

Attribute.Name: sample storage temperature
Attribute.Description: temperature at which sample was stored, e.g. -80

Attribute.Name: sample volume or weight for DNA extraction
Attribute.Description: volume (mL) or weight (g) of sample processed for DNA extraction

Attribute.Name: source material identifiers
Attribute.Description: unique identifier assigned to a material sample used for extracting nucleic acids, and subsequent sequencing. The identifier can refer either to the original material collected or to any derived sub-samples.
Attribute.DescriptionJa: 核酸抽出とシークエンスに使用された実験材料に対する ID。採取された元々の材料，もしくは，そこから派生したサンプルを参照する ID を記載することができます。

Attribute.Name: subspecific genetic lineage
Attribute.Description: Information about the genetic distinctness of the lineage (eg., biovar, serovar)

Attribute.Name: Fhost
Attribute.Description: temperature of the sample at time of sampling

Attribute.Name: trophic level
Attribute.Description: Feeding position in food chain (eg., chemolithotroph)

Attribute.Name: sample name
Attribute.Description: The sample name is a name that you choose for the sample, it works as an ID. Each sample name must be unique in samples submitted from a submission account.
Attribute.DescriptionJa: sample name は登録者がサンプルに付ける名前で ID として機能します。sample name は Submission においてユニークである必要があります。

Attribute.Name: sample title
Attribute.Description: Sample title should be short and informative. Each sample title must be unique in a submission. Examples: 1) Escherichia coli O104:H4 str. C227-11 clinical isolate 2010_333_NC-6; 2) CD8+ T cells from female TSG6-knockout BALB/c mouse; 3) Human metagenome isolated from urine of healthy female.
Attribute.DescriptionJa: タイトルはサンプルをよく表す簡潔なものを記入します。 タイトルはアカウントから登録されたサンプルにおいてユニークである必要があります。 例: 1) Escherichia coli O104:H4 str. C227-11 clinical isolate 2010_333_NC-6; 2) CD8+ T cells from female TSG6-knockout BALB/c mouse; 3) Human metagenome isolated from urine of healthy female.

Attribute.Name: description
Attribute.Description: A brief description for the sample.
Attribute.DescriptionJa: サンプルに対する簡潔な補足情報。

Attribute.Name: organism
Attribute.Description: The most descriptive organism name for this sample (to the species, if relevant) in the NCBI Taxonomy database, http://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/taxonomy If it is not in the database, provide as much information about the organism as possible and the DDBJ staff apply a new organism name to NCBI Taxonomy.
Attribute.DescriptionJa: NCBI Taxonomy database，http://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/taxonomy に登録されている最も下位のランクの生物名 (適切な場合は species まで)。データベースに登録されていない場合，未登録の生物に関する情報をできるだけ記入してください。 DDBJ スタッフが NCBI Taxonomy に未登録の生物を申請します。

Attribute.Name: taxonomy id
Attribute.Description: NCBI Taxonomy identifier. This is appropriate for individual organisms, some metagenomes and environmental samples (http://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/Taxonomy/Browser/wwwtax.cgi?mode=Undef&id=12908&lvl=3&lin=f&keep=1&srchmode=1&unlock). If it is not in the database, enter a tentative ID (e.g., 1). The DDBJ staff apply a new organism name to NCBI Taxonomy, and then the tentative ID is replaced by an assigned TaxID.

Attribute.Name: bioproject accession
Attribute.Description: Associated BioProject accession number (PRJDB)
Attribute.DescriptionJa: 関連する BioProject アクセッション番号 (PRJDB)

Attribute.Name: strain
Attribute.Description: microbial or eukaryotic strain name
Attribute.DescriptionJa: 微生物や真核生物の株名。

Attribute.Name: isolate
Attribute.Description: Identification or description of the specific individual from which this sample was obtained
Attribute.DescriptionJa: サンプルの得られた individual isolate

Attribute.Name: cultivar
Attribute.Description: Cultivar name - cultivated variety of plant
Attribute.DescriptionJa: 植物の栽培品種名。

Attribute.Name: ecotype
Attribute.Description: a population within a given species displaying genetically based, phenotypic traits that reflect adaptation to a local habitat, e.g., Columbia

Attribute.Name: environment biome
Attribute.Description: Descriptor of the broad ecological context of a sample. Examples include: desert, taiga or deciduous woodland. FAQ, http://trace.ddbj.nig.ac.jp/biosample/faq_e.html#biome-feature-material EnvO (v 2013-06-14) terms can be found via the link: http://www.environmentontology.org/Browse-EnvO
Attribute.DescriptionJa: サンプルに関する広い生態学的な環境。例: desert，taiga，deciduous woodland。FAQ，http://trace.ddbj.nig.ac.jp/biosample/faq.html#biome-feature-material EnvO (v 2013-06-14) 用語は次のリストから探すことができます: http://www.environmentontology.org/Browse-EnvO

Attribute.Name: environment feature
Attribute.Description: Descriptor of the local environment. Examples include: harbor, cliff, or lake. FAQ, http://trace.ddbj.nig.ac.jp/biosample/faq_e.html#biome-feature-material EnvO (v 2013-06-14) terms can be found via the link: http://www.environmentontology.org/Browse-EnvO
Attribute.DescriptionJa: 局所的な環境。例：harbor，cliff，lake。FAQ，http://trace.ddbj.nig.ac.jp/biosample/faq.html#biome-feature-material EnvO (v 2013-06-14) 用語は次のリストから探すことができます: http://www.environmentontology.org/Browse-EnvO

Attribute.Name: environment material
Attribute.Description: Material that was displaced by the sample, or material in which a sample was embedded, prior to the sampling event. Examples include: air, soil, or water. FAQ, http://trace.ddbj.nig.ac.jp/biosample/faq_e.html#biome-feature-material EnvO (v 2013-06-14) terms can be found via the link: http://www.environmentontology.org/Browse-EnvO
Attribute.DescriptionJa: サンプリングする前、サンプルによって置換されていた物質やサンプルが埋め込まれていた物質。例: air，soil，water。FAQ，http://trace.ddbj.nig.ac.jp/biosample/faq.html#biome-feature-material EnvO (v 2013-06-14) 用語は次のリストから探すことができます: http://www.environmentontology.org/Browse-EnvO

Attribute.Name: geographic location
Attribute.Description: Geographical origin of the sample; use the appropriate name from the list, http://www.ddbj.nig.ac.jp/sub/country-e.html. Use a colon to separate the country or ocean from more detailed information about the location, eg "Japan:Kanagawa, Hakone, Lake Ashi"
Attribute.DescriptionJa: サンプルを得た地域。国，大洋，または，海，の名称を次のリストから選択します，http://www.ddbj.nig.ac.jp/sub/country-e.html コロンに続けて地方・地域を示します。 例：Japan:Kanagawa，Hakone，Lake Ashi

Attribute.Name: host
Attribute.Description: The natural (as opposed to laboratory) host to the organism from which the sample was obtained. Use the full taxonomic name, eg, "Homo sapiens".
Attribute.DescriptionJa: サンプルが取得された生物の (ラボではなく) 自然界での宿主。"Homo sapiens" のように学名を記載。

Attribute.Name: isolation and growth condition
Attribute.Description: Publication reference in the form of pubmed ID, DOI or URL for isolation and growth condition specifications of the organism/material
Attribute.DescriptionJa: 単離や生育条件の詳細を記載している pubmed ID，DOI， あるいは URL

Attribute.Name: latitude and longitude
Attribute.Description: The geographical coordinates of the location where the sample was collected. Specify as decimal degrees latitude and longitude in format "d[d.dddd] N|S d[dd.dddd] W|E", eg, 47.94 N 28.12 W
Attribute.DescriptionJa: サンプルが採取された位置の地理的座標。 (書式：d[d.dddd] N|S d[dd.dddd] W|E) (例: 47.94 N 28.12 W) 小数点以下の数字は分秒ではなく小数で記載してください。

Attribute.Name: amniotic fluid color
Attribute.Description: specification of the color of the amniotic fluid sample

Attribute.Name: observed biotic relationship
Attribute.Description: Free-living or from host (define relationship)

Attribute.Name: blood disorder
Attribute.Description: history of blood disorders; can include multiple disorders

Attribute.Name: chemical administration
Attribute.Description: list of chemical compounds administered to the host or site where sampling occurred, and when (e.g. antibiotics, N fertilizer, air filter); can include multiple compounds. For Chemical Entities of Biological Interest ontology (CHEBI) (v1.72), please see http://bioportal.bioontology.org/visualize/44603

Attribute.Name: major diet change in last six months
Attribute.Description: specification of major diet changes in the last six months, if yes the change should be specified

Attribute.Name: drug usage
Attribute.Description: any drug used by subject and the frequency of usage; can include multiple drugs used

Attribute.Name: ethnicity
Attribute.Description: ethnicity of the subject

Attribute.Name: extrachromosomal elements
Attribute.Description: Plasmids that have significance phenotypic consequence

Attribute.Name: fetal health status
Attribute.Description: specification of foetal health status, should also include abortion

Attribute.Name: gestation state
Attribute.Description: specification of the gestation state

Attribute.Name: host age
Attribute.Description: Age of host at the time of sampling
Attribute.DescriptionJa: サンプリング時の宿主の年齢

Attribute.Name: host body mass index
Attribute.Description: body mass index of the host, calculated as weight/(height)squared

Attribute.Name: host body product
Attribute.Description: substance produced by the host, e.g. stool, mucus, where the sample was obtained from

Attribute.Name: host body temperature
Attribute.Description: core body temperature of the host when sample was collected
Attribute.DescriptionJa: サンプルを採取した時の宿主の体温

Attribute.Name: host diet
Attribute.Description: type of diet depending on the sample for animals omnivore, herbivore etc., for humans high-fat, meditteranean etc.; can include multiple diet types

Attribute.Name: host disease
Attribute.Description: Name of relevant disease, e.g. Salmonella gastroenteritis. For the controlled vocabulary, please see Human Disease Ontology, http://bioportal.bioontology.org/ontologies/1009 or MeSH, http://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/mesh
Attribute.DescriptionJa: 宿主の病気の名称。(例：Salmonella gastroenteritis) Controlled vocabulary としては以下のオントロジーを参照: Human Disease Ontology，http://bioportal.bioontology.org/ontologies/1009，MeSH，http://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/mesh

Attribute.Name: host height
Attribute.Description: the height of subject

Attribute.Name: host HIV status
Attribute.Description: HIV status of subject, if yes HAART initiation status should also be indicated as [YES or NO]

Attribute.Name: host last meal
Attribute.Description: content of last meal and time since feeding; can include multiple values

Attribute.Name: host occupation
Attribute.Description: most frequent job performed by subject

Attribute.Name: host pulse
Attribute.Description: resting pulse of the host, measured as beats per minute

Attribute.Name: host sex
Attribute.Description: Gender or physical sex of the host
Attribute.DescriptionJa: 宿主の性別

Attribute.Name: host subject id
Attribute.Description: a unique identifier by which each subject can be referred to, de-identified, e.g. #131
Attribute.DescriptionJa: 宿主の匿名化されたユニーク ID

Attribute.Name: host tissue sampled
Attribute.Description: Type of tissue the initial sample was taken from. Controlled vocabulary, http://bioportal.bioontology.org/ontologies/1005

Attribute.Name: host total mass
Attribute.Description: total mass of the host at collection, the unit depends on host

Attribute.Name: medication code
Attribute.Description: can include multiple medication codes

Attribute.Name: isolation source
Attribute.Description: Describes the physical, environmental and/or local geographical source of the biological sample from which the sample was derived.
Attribute.DescriptionJa: サンプルが得られた生物学的サンプルに関する，物理的，環境的，かつまたは，地理的な由来

Attribute.Name: kidney disorder
Attribute.Description: history of kidney disorders; can include multiple disorders

Attribute.Name: maternal health status
Attribute.Description: specification of the maternal health status

Attribute.Name: medical history performed
Attribute.Description: whether full medical history was collected

Attribute.Name: miscellaneous parameter
Attribute.Description: any other measurement performed or parameter collected, that is not listed here

Attribute.Name: nose throat disorder
Attribute.Description: history of nose-throat disorders; can include multiple disorders

Attribute.Name: organism count
Attribute.Description: total count of any organism per gram or volume of sample, should include name of organism followed by count; can include multiple organism counts

Attribute.Name: oxygenation status of sample
Attribute.Description: oxygenation status of sample

Attribute.Name: perturbation
Attribute.Description: type of perturbation, e.g. chemical administration, physical disturbance, etc., coupled with time that perturbation occurred; can include multiple perturbation types

Attribute.Name: presence of pets or farm animals
Attribute.Description: specification of presence of pets or farm animals in the environment of subject, if yes the animals should be specified; can include multiple animals present

Attribute.Name: pulmonary disorder
Attribute.Description: history of pulmonary disorders; can include multiple disorders

Attribute.Name: relationship to oxygen
Attribute.Description: Aerobic or anaerobic

Attribute.Name: sample collection device or method
Attribute.Description: Method or device employed for collecting sample

Attribute.Name: sample material processing
Attribute.Description: Processing applied to the sample during or after isolation

Attribute.Name: sample salinity
Attribute.Description: salinity of sample, i.e. measure of total salt concentration

Attribute.Name: sample size
Attribute.Description: Amount or size of sample (volume, mass or area) that was collected

Attribute.Name: sample storage duration
Attribute.Description: duration for which sample was stored

Attribute.Name: sample storage location
Attribute.Description: location at which sample was stored, usually name of a specific freezer/room

Attribute.Name: sample storage temperature
Attribute.Description: temperature at which sample was stored, e.g. -80

Attribute.Name: sample volume or weight for DNA extraction
Attribute.Description: volume (mL) or weight (g) of sample processed for DNA extraction

Attribute.Name: smoker
Attribute.Description: specification of smoking status

Attribute.Name: source material identifiers
Attribute.Description: unique identifier assigned to a material sample used for extracting nucleic acids, and subsequent sequencing. The identifier can refer either to the original material collected or to any derived sub-samples.
Attribute.DescriptionJa: 核酸抽出とシークエンスに使用された実験材料に対する ID。採取された元々の材料，もしくは，そこから派生したサンプルを参照する ID を記載することができます。

Attribute.Name: study completion status
Attribute.Description: specification of study completion status, if no the reason should be specified

Attribute.Name: subspecific genetic lineage
Attribute.Description: Information about the genetic distinctness of the lineage (eg., biovar, serovar)

Attribute.Name: Fhost
Attribute.Description: temperature of the sample at time of sampling

Attribute.Name: travel outside the country in last six months
Attribute.Description: specification of the countries travelled in the last six months; can include multiple travels

Attribute.Name: trophic level
Attribute.Description: Feeding position in food chain (eg., chemolithotroph)

Attribute.Name: twin sibling existence
Attribute.Description: specification of twin sibling presence

Attribute.Name: urine collection method
Attribute.Description: specification of urine collection method

Attribute.Name: urogenital tract disorder
Attribute.Description: history of urogenitaltract disorders; can include multiple disorders

Attribute.Name: weight loss in last three months
Attribute.Description: specification of weight loss in the last three months, if yes should be further specified to include amount of weight loss

Attribute.Name: sample name
Attribute.Description: The sample name is a name that you choose for the sample, it works as an ID. Each sample name must be unique in samples submitted from a submission account.
Attribute.DescriptionJa: sample name は登録者がサンプルに付ける名前で ID として機能します。sample name は Submission においてユニークである必要があります。

Attribute.Description: Processing applied to the sample during or after isolation

Attribute.Name: sample salinity
Attribute.Description: salinity of sample, i.e. measure of total salt concentration

Attribute.Name: sample size
Attribute.Description: Amount or size of sample (volume, mass or area) that was collected

Attribute.Name: sample storage duration
Attribute.Description: duration for which sample was stored

Attribute.Name: sample storage location
Attribute.Description: location at which sample was stored, usually name of a specific freezer/room

Attribute.Name: sample storage temperature
Attribute.Description: temperature at which sample was stored, e.g. -80

Attribute.Name: sample volume or weight for DNA extraction
Attribute.Description: volume (mL) or weight (g) of sample processed for DNA extraction

Attribute.Name: source material identifiers
Attribute.Description: unique identifier assigned to a material sample used for extracting nucleic acids, and subsequent sequencing. The identifier can refer either to the original material collected or to any derived sub-samples.
Attribute.DescriptionJa: 核酸抽出とシークエンスに使用された実験材料に対する ID。採取された元々の材料，もしくは，そこから派生したサンプルを参照する ID を記載することができます。

Attribute.Name: special diet
Attribute.Description: specification of special diet; can include multiple special diets

Attribute.Name: subspecific genetic lineage
Attribute.Description: Information about the genetic distinctness of the lineage (eg., biovar, serovar)

Attribute.Name: Fhost
Attribute.Description: temperature of the sample at time of sampling

Attribute.Name: trophic level
Attribute.Description: Feeding position in food chain (eg., chemolithotroph)

Attribute.Name: sample name
Attribute.Description: The sample name is a name that you choose for the sample, it works as an ID. Each sample name must be unique in samples submitted from a submission account.
Attribute.DescriptionJa: sample name は登録者がサンプルに付ける名前で ID として機能します。sample name は Submission においてユニークである必要があります。

Attribute.Name: sample title
Attribute.Description: Sample title should be short and informative. Each sample title must be unique in a submission. Examples: 1) Escherichia coli O104:H4 str. C227-11 clinical isolate 2010_333_NC-6; 2) CD8+ T cells from female TSG6-knockout BALB/c mouse; 3) Human metagenome isolated from urine of healthy female.
Attribute.DescriptionJa: タイトルはサンプルをよく表す簡潔なものを記入します。 タイトルはアカウントから登録されたサンプルにおいてユニークである必要があります。 例: 1) Escherichia coli O104:H4 str. C227-11 clinical isolate 2010_333_NC-6; 2) CD8+ T cells from female TSG6-knockout BALB/c mouse; 3) Human metagenome isolated from urine of healthy female.

Attribute.Name: description
Attribute.Description: A brief description for the sample.
Attribute.DescriptionJa: サンプルに対する簡潔な補足情報。

Attribute.Name: organism
Attribute.Description: The most descriptive organism name for this sample (to the species, if relevant) in the NCBI Taxonomy database, http://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/taxonomy If it is not in the database, provide as much information about the organism as possible and the DDBJ staff apply a new organism name to NCBI Taxonomy.
Attribute.DescriptionJa: NCBI Taxonomy database，http://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/taxonomy に登録されている最も下位のランクの生物名 (適切な場合は species まで)。データベースに登録されていない場合，未登録の生物に関する情報をできるだけ記入してください。 DDBJ スタッフが NCBI Taxonomy に未登録の生物を申請します。

Attribute.Name: taxonomy id
Attribute.Description: NCBI Taxonomy identifier. This is appropriate for individual organisms, some metagenomes and environmental samples (http://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/Taxonomy/Browser/wwwtax.cgi?mode=Undef&id=12908&lvl=3&lin=f&keep=1&srchmode=1&unlock). If it is not in the database, enter a tentative ID (e.g., 1). The DDBJ staff apply a new organism name to NCBI Taxonomy, and then the tentative ID is replaced by an assigned TaxID.

Attribute.Name: bioproject accession
Attribute.Description: Associated BioProject accession number (PRJDB)
Attribute.DescriptionJa: 関連する BioProject アクセッション番号 (PRJDB)

Attribute.Name: strain
Attribute.Description: microbial or eukaryotic strain name
Attribute.DescriptionJa: 微生物や真核生物の株名。

Attribute.Name: isolate
Attribute.Description: Identification or description of the specific individual from which this sample was obtained
Attribute.DescriptionJa: サンプルの得られた individual isolate

Attribute.Name: cultivar
Attribute.Description: Cultivar name - cultivated variety of plant
Attribute.DescriptionJa: 植物の栽培品種名。

Attribute.Name: ecotype
Attribute.Description: a population within a given species displaying genetically based, phenotypic traits that reflect adaptation to a local habitat, e.g., Columbia

Attribute.Name: environment biome
Attribute.Description: Descriptor of the broad ecological context of a sample. Examples include: desert, taiga or deciduous woodland. FAQ, http://trace.ddbj.nig.ac.jp/biosample/faq_e.html#biome-feature-material EnvO (v 2013-06-14) terms can be found via the link: http://www.environmentontology.org/Browse-EnvO
Attribute.DescriptionJa: サンプルに関する広い生態学的な環境。例: desert，taiga，deciduous woodland。FAQ，http://trace.ddbj.nig.ac.jp/biosample/faq.html#biome-feature-material EnvO (v 2013-06-14) 用語は次のリストから探すことができます: http://www.environmentontology.org/Browse-EnvO

Attribute.Name: environment feature
Attribute.Description: Descriptor of the local environment. Examples include: harbor, cliff, or lake. FAQ, http://trace.ddbj.nig.ac.jp/biosample/faq_e.html#biome-feature-material EnvO (v 2013-06-14) terms can be found via the link: http://www.environmentontology.org/Browse-EnvO
Attribute.DescriptionJa: 局所的な環境。例：harbor，cliff，lake。FAQ，http://trace.ddbj.nig.ac.jp/biosample/faq.html#biome-feature-material EnvO (v 2013-06-14) 用語は次のリストから探すことができます: http://www.environmentontology.org/Browse-EnvO

Attribute.Name: environment material
Attribute.Description: Material that was displaced by the sample, or material in which a sample was embedded, prior to the sampling event. Examples include: air, soil, or water. FAQ, http://trace.ddbj.nig.ac.jp/biosample/faq_e.html#biome-feature-material EnvO (v 2013-06-14) terms can be found via the link: http://www.environmentontology.org/Browse-EnvO
Attribute.DescriptionJa: サンプリングする前、サンプルによって置換されていた物質やサンプルが埋め込まれていた物質。例: air，soil，water。FAQ，http://trace.ddbj.nig.ac.jp/biosample/faq.html#biome-feature-material EnvO (v 2013-06-14) 用語は次のリストから探すことができます: http://www.environmentontology.org/Browse-EnvO

Attribute.Name: geographic location
Attribute.Description: Geographical origin of the sample; use the appropriate name from the list, http://www.ddbj.nig.ac.jp/sub/country-e.html. Use a colon to separate the country or ocean from more detailed information about the location, eg "Japan:Kanagawa, Hakone, Lake Ashi"
Attribute.DescriptionJa: サンプルを得た地域。国，大洋，または，海，の名称を次のリストから選択します，http://www.ddbj.nig.ac.jp/sub/country-e.html コロンに続けて地方・地域を示します。 例：Japan:Kanagawa，Hakone，Lake Ashi

Attribute.Name: host
Attribute.Description: The natural (as opposed to laboratory) host to the organism from which the sample was obtained. Use the full taxonomic name, eg, "Homo sapiens".
Attribute.DescriptionJa: サンプルが取得された生物の (ラボではなく) 自然界での宿主。"Homo sapiens" のように学名を記載。

Attribute.Name: isolation and growth condition
Attribute.Description: Publication reference in the form of pubmed ID, DOI or URL for isolation and growth condition specifications of the organism/material
Attribute.DescriptionJa: 単離や生育条件の詳細を記載している pubmed ID，DOI， あるいは URL

Attribute.Name: latitude and longitude
Attribute.Description: The geographical coordinates of the location where the sample was collected. Specify as decimal degrees latitude and longitude in format "d[d.dddd] N|S d[dd.dddd] W|E", eg, 47.94 N 28.12 W
Attribute.DescriptionJa: サンプルが採取された位置の地理的座標。 (書式：d[d.dddd] N|S d[dd.dddd] W|E) (例: 47.94 N 28.12 W) 小数点以下の数字は分秒ではなく小数で記載してください。

Attribute.Name: observed biotic relationship
Attribute.Description: Free-living or from host (define relationship)

Attribute.Name: chemical administration
Attribute.Description: list of chemical compounds administered to the host or site where sampling occurred, and when (e.g. antibiotics, N fertilizer, air filter); can include multiple compounds. For Chemical Entities of Biological Interest ontology (CHEBI) (v1.72), please see http://bioportal.bioontology.org/visualize/44603

Attribute.Name: ethnicity
Attribute.Description: ethnicity of the subject

Attribute.Name: extrachromosomal elements
Attribute.Description: Plasmids that have significance phenotypic consequence

Attribute.Name: host age
Attribute.Description: Age of host at the time of sampling
Attribute.DescriptionJa: サンプリング時の宿主の年齢

Attribute.Name: host body mass index
Attribute.Description: body mass index of the host, calculated as weight/(height)squared

Attribute.Name: host body product
Attribute.Description: substance produced by the host, e.g. stool, mucus, where the sample was obtained from

Attribute.Name: host body temperature
Attribute.Description: core body temperature of the host when sample was collected
Attribute.DescriptionJa: サンプルを採取した時の宿主の体温

Attribute.Name: host diet
Attribute.Description: type of diet depending on the sample for animals omnivore, herbivore etc., for humans high-fat, meditteranean etc.; can include multiple diet types

Attribute.Name: host disease
Attribute.Description: Name of relevant disease, e.g. Salmonella gastroenteritis. For the controlled vocabulary, please see Human Disease Ontology, http://bioportal.bioontology.org/ontologies/1009 or MeSH, http://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/mesh
Attribute.DescriptionJa: 宿主の病気の名称。(例：Salmonella gastroenteritis) Controlled vocabulary としては以下のオントロジーを参照: Human Disease Ontology，http://bioportal.bioontology.org/ontologies/1009，MeSH，http://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/mesh

Attribute.Name: host height
Attribute.Description: the height of subject

Attribute.Name: host last meal
Attribute.Description: content of last meal and time since feeding; can include multiple values

Attribute.Name: host occupation
Attribute.Description: most frequent job performed by subject

Attribute.Name: host pulse
Attribute.Description: resting pulse of the host, measured as beats per minute

Attribute.Name: host sex
Attribute.Description: Gender or physical sex of the host
Attribute.DescriptionJa: 宿主の性別

Attribute.Name: host subject id
Attribute.Description: a unique identifier by which each subject can be referred to, de-identified, e.g. #131
Attribute.DescriptionJa: 宿主の匿名化されたユニーク ID

Attribute.Name: host tissue sampled
Attribute.Description: Type of tissue the initial sample was taken from. Controlled vocabulary, http://bioportal.bioontology.org/ontologies/1005

Attribute.Name: host total mass
Attribute.Description: total mass of the host at collection, the unit depends on host

Attribute.Name: medication code
Attribute.Description: can include multiple medication codes

Attribute.Name: isolation source
Attribute.Description: Describes the physical, environmental and/or local geographical source of the biological sample from which the sample was derived.
Attribute.DescriptionJa: サンプルが得られた生物学的サンプルに関する，物理的，環境的，かつまたは，地理的な由来

Attribute.Name: medical history performed
Attribute.Description: whether full medical history was collected

Attribute.Name: miscellaneous parameter
Attribute.Description: any other measurement performed or parameter collected, that is not listed here

Attribute.Name: nose/mouth/teeth/throat disorder
Attribute.Description: history of nose/mouth/teeth/throat disorders; can include multiple disorders

Attribute.Name: organism count
Attribute.Description: total count of any organism per gram or volume of sample, should include name of organism followed by count; can include multiple organism counts

Attribute.Name: oxygenation status of sample
Attribute.Description: oxygenation status of sample

Attribute.Name: perturbation
Attribute.Description: type of perturbation, e.g. chemical administration, physical disturbance, etc., coupled with time that perturbation occurred; can include multiple perturbation types

Attribute.Name: relationship to oxygen
Attribute.Description: Aerobic or anaerobic

Attribute.Name: sample collection device or method
Attribute.Description: Method or device employed for collecting sample

Attribute.Name: sample material processing
Attribute.Description: Processing applied to the sample during or after isolation

Attribute.Description: salinity of sample, i.e. measure of total salt concentration

Attribute.Description: Amount or size of sample (volume, mass or area) that was collected

Attribute.Name: sample storage duration
Attribute.Description: duration for which sample was stored

Attribute.Name: sample storage location
Attribute.Description: location at which sample was stored, usually name of a specific freezer/room

Attribute.Name: sample storage temperature
Attribute.Description: temperature at which sample was stored, e.g. -80

Attribute.Name: sample volume or weight for DNA extraction
Attribute.Description: volume (mL) or weight (g) of sample processed for DNA extraction

Attribute.DescriptionJa: タイトルはサンプルをよく表す簡潔なものを記入します。 タイトルはアカウントから登録されたサンプルにおいてユニークである必要があります。 例: 1) Escherichia coli O104:H4 str. C227-11 clinical isolate 2010_333_NC-6; 2) CD8+ T cells from female TSG6-knockout BALB/c mouse; 3) Human metagenome isolated from urine of healthy female.

Attribute.Name: description
Attribute.Description: A brief description for the sample.
Attribute.DescriptionJa: サンプルに対する簡潔な補足情報。

Attribute.Name: organism
Attribute.Description: The most descriptive organism name for this sample (to the species, if relevant) in the NCBI Taxonomy database, http://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/taxonomy If it is not in the database, provide as much information about the organism as possible and the DDBJ staff apply a new organism name to NCBI Taxonomy.
Attribute.DescriptionJa: NCBI Taxonomy database，http://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/taxonomy に登録されている最も下位のランクの生物名 (適切な場合は species まで)。データベースに登録されていない場合，未登録の生物に関する情報をできるだけ記入してください。 DDBJ スタッフが NCBI Taxonomy に未登録の生物を申請します。

Attribute.Name: taxonomy id
Attribute.Description: NCBI Taxonomy identifier. This is appropriate for individual organisms, some metagenomes and environmental samples (http://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/Taxonomy/Browser/wwwtax.cgi?mode=Undef&id=12908&lvl=3&lin=f&keep=1&srchmode=1&unlock). If it is not in the database, enter a tentative ID (e.g., 1). The DDBJ staff apply a new organism name to NCBI Taxonomy, and then the tentative ID is replaced by an assigned TaxID.

Attribute.Name: bioproject accession
Attribute.Description: Associated BioProject accession number (PRJDB)
Attribute.DescriptionJa: 関連する BioProject アクセッション番号 (PRJDB)

Attribute.Name: strain
Attribute.Description: microbial or eukaryotic strain name
Attribute.DescriptionJa: 微生物や真核生物の株名。

Attribute.Name: isolate
Attribute.Description: Identification or description of the specific individual from which this sample was obtained
Attribute.DescriptionJa: サンプルの得られた individual isolate

Attribute.Name: cultivar
Attribute.Description: Cultivar name - cultivated variety of plant
Attribute.DescriptionJa: 植物の栽培品種名。

Attribute.Name: ecotype
Attribute.Description: a population within a given species displaying genetically based, phenotypic traits that reflect adaptation to a local habitat, e.g., Columbia

Attribute.Name: environment biome
Attribute.Description: Descriptor of the broad ecological context of a sample. Examples include: desert, taiga or deciduous woodland. FAQ, http://trace.ddbj.nig.ac.jp/biosample/faq_e.html#biome-feature-material EnvO (v 2013-06-14) terms can be found via the link: http://www.environmentontology.org/Browse-EnvO
Attribute.DescriptionJa: サンプルに関する広い生態学的な環境。例: desert，taiga，deciduous woodland。FAQ，http://trace.ddbj.nig.ac.jp/biosample/faq.html#biome-feature-material EnvO (v 2013-06-14) 用語は次のリストから探すことができます: http://www.environmentontology.org/Browse-EnvO

Attribute.Name: environment feature
Attribute.Description: Descriptor of the local environment. Examples include: harbor, cliff, or lake. FAQ, http://trace.ddbj.nig.ac.jp/biosample/faq_e.html#biome-feature-material EnvO (v 2013-06-14) terms can be found via the link: http://www.environmentontology.org/Browse-EnvO
Attribute.DescriptionJa: 局所的な環境。例：harbor，cliff，lake。FAQ，http://trace.ddbj.nig.ac.jp/biosample/faq.html#biome-feature-material EnvO (v 2013-06-14) 用語は次のリストから探すことができます: http://www.environmentontology.org/Browse-EnvO

Attribute.Name: environment material
Attribute.Description: Material that was displaced by the sample, or material in which a sample was embedded, prior to the sampling event. Examples include: air, soil, or water. FAQ, http://trace.ddbj.nig.ac.jp/biosample/faq_e.html#biome-feature-material EnvO (v 2013-06-14) terms can be found via the link: http://www.environmentontology.org/Browse-EnvO
Attribute.DescriptionJa: サンプリングする前、サンプルによって置換されていた物質やサンプルが埋め込まれていた物質。例: air，soil，water。FAQ，http://trace.ddbj.nig.ac.jp/biosample/faq.html#biome-feature-material EnvO (v 2013-06-14) 用語は次のリストから探すことができます: http://www.environmentontology.org/Browse-EnvO

Attribute.Name: geographic location
Attribute.Description: Geographical origin of the sample; use the appropriate name from the list, http://www.ddbj.nig.ac.jp/sub/country-e.html. Use a colon to separate the country or ocean from more detailed information about the location, eg "Japan:Kanagawa, Hakone, Lake Ashi"
Attribute.DescriptionJa: サンプルを得た地域。国，大洋，または，海，の名称を次のリストから選択します，http://www.ddbj.nig.ac.jp/sub/country-e.html コロンに続けて地方・地域を示します。 例：Japan:Kanagawa，Hakone，Lake Ashi

Attribute.Name: host
Attribute.Description: The natural (as opposed to laboratory) host to the organism from which the sample was obtained. Use the full taxonomic name, eg, "Homo sapiens".
Attribute.DescriptionJa: サンプルが取得された生物の (ラボではなく) 自然界での宿主。"Homo sapiens" のように学名を記載。

Attribute.Name: isolation and growth condition
Attribute.Description: Publication reference in the form of pubmed ID, DOI or URL for isolation and growth condition specifications of the organism/material
Attribute.DescriptionJa: 単離や生育条件の詳細を記載している pubmed ID，DOI， あるいは URL

Attribute.Name: latitude and longitude
Attribute.Description: The geographical coordinates of the location where the sample was collected. Specify as decimal degrees latitude and longitude in format "d[d.dddd] N|S d[dd.dddd] W|E", eg, 47.94 N 28.12 W
Attribute.DescriptionJa: サンプルが採取された位置の地理的座標。 (書式：d[d.dddd] N|S d[dd.dddd] W|E) (例: 47.94 N 28.12 W) 小数点以下の数字は分秒ではなく小数で記載してください。

Attribute.Name: observed biotic relationship
Attribute.Description: Free-living or from host (define relationship)

Attribute.Name: birth control
Attribute.Description: specification of birth control medication used

Attribute.Name: chemical administration
Attribute.Description: list of chemical compounds administered to the host or site where sampling occurred, and when (e.g. antibiotics, N fertilizer, air filter); can include multiple compounds. For Chemical Entities of Biological Interest ontology (CHEBI) (v1.72), please see http://bioportal.bioontology.org/visualize/44603

Attribute.Name: douche
Attribute.Description: date of most recent douche

Attribute.Name: ethnicity
Attribute.Description: ethnicity of the subject

Attribute.Name: extrachromosomal elements
Attribute.Description: Plasmids that have significance phenotypic consequence

Attribute.Name: gynecological disorder
Attribute.Description: history of gynecological disorders; can include multiple disorders

Attribute.Name: host age
Attribute.Description: Age of host at the time of sampling
Attribute.DescriptionJa: サンプリング時の宿主の年齢

Attribute.Name: host body mass index
Attribute.Description: body mass index of the host, calculated as weight/(height)squared

Attribute.Name: host body product
Attribute.Description: substance produced by the host, e.g. stool, mucus, where the sample was obtained from

Attribute.Name: host body temperature
Attribute.Description: core body temperature of the host when sample was collected
Attribute.DescriptionJa: サンプルを採取した時の宿主の体温

Attribute.Name: host diet
Attribute.Description: type of diet depending on the sample for animals omnivore, herbivore etc., for humans high-fat, meditteranean etc.; can include multiple diet types

Attribute.Name: host disease
Attribute.Description: Name of relevant disease, e.g. Salmonella gastroenteritis. For the controlled vocabulary, please see Human Disease Ontology, http://bioportal.bioontology.org/ontologies/1009 or MeSH, http://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/mesh
Attribute.DescriptionJa: 宿主の病気の名称。(例：Salmonella gastroenteritis) Controlled vocabulary としては以下のオントロジーを参照: Human Disease Ontology，http://bioportal.bioontology.org/ontologies/1009，MeSH，http://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/mesh

Attribute.Name: host height
Attribute.Description: the height of subject

Attribute.Name: host last meal
Attribute.Description: content of last meal and time since feeding; can include multiple values

Attribute.Name: host occupation
Attribute.Description: most frequent job performed by subject

Attribute.Name: host pulse
Attribute.Description: resting pulse of the host, measured as beats per minute

Attribute.Name: host sex
Attribute.Description: Gender or physical sex of the host
Attribute.DescriptionJa: 宿主の性別

Attribute.Name: host subject id
Attribute.Description: a unique identifier by which each subject can be referred to, de-identified, e.g. #131
Attribute.DescriptionJa: 宿主の匿名化されたユニーク ID

Attribute.Name: host tissue sampled
Attribute.Description: Type of tissue the initial sample was taken from. Controlled vocabulary, http://bioportal.bioontology.org/ontologies/1005

Attribute.Name: host total mass
Attribute.Description: total mass of the host at collection, the unit depends on host

Attribute.Name: hrt
Attribute.Description: whether subject had hormone replacement theraphy, and if yes start date

Attribute.Name: hysterectomy
Attribute.Description: specification of whether hysterectomy was performed

Attribute.Name: medication code
Attribute.Description: can include multiple medication codes

Attribute.Name: isolation source
Attribute.Description: Describes the physical, environmental and/or local geographical source of the biological sample from which the sample was derived.
Attribute.DescriptionJa: サンプルが得られた生物学的サンプルに関する，物理的，環境的，かつまたは，地理的な由来

Attribute.Name: medical history performed
Attribute.Description: whether full medical history was collected

Attribute.Name: menarche
Attribute.Description: date of most recent menstruation

Attribute.Name: menopause
Attribute.Description: date of onset of menopause

Attribute.Name: miscellaneous parameter
Attribute.Description: any other measurement performed or parameter collected, that is not listed here

Attribute.Name: organism count
Attribute.Description: total count of any organism per gram or volume of sample, should include name of organism followed by count; can include multiple organism counts

Attribute.Name: oxygenation status of sample
Attribute.Description: oxygenation status of sample

Attribute.Name: perturbation
Attribute.Description: type of perturbation, e.g. chemical administration, physical disturbance, etc., coupled with time that perturbation occurred; can include multiple perturbation types

Attribute.Name: pregnancy
Attribute.Description: date due of pregnancy

Attribute.Name: relationship to oxygen
Attribute.Description: Aerobic or anaerobic

Attribute.Name: sample collection device or method
Attribute.Description: Method or device employed for collecting sample

Attribute.Name: sample material processing
Attribute.Description: Processing applied to the sample during or after isolation

Attribute.Name: sample salinity
Attribute.Description: salinity of sample, i.e. measure of total salt concentration

Attribute.Name: sample size
Attribute.Description: Amount or size of sample (volume, mass or area) that was collected

Attribute.Name: sample storage duration
Attribute.Description: duration for which sample was stored

Attribute.Name: sample storage location
Attribute.Description: location at which sample was stored, usually name of a specific freezer/room

Attribute.Name: sample storage temperature
Attribute.Description: temperature at which sample was stored, e.g. -80

Attribute.Name: sample volume or weight for DNA extraction
Attribute.Description: volume (mL) or weight (g) of sample processed for DNA extraction

Attribute.Name: sexual activity
Attribute.Description: current sexual partner and frequency of sex

Attribute.Name: source material identifiers
Attribute.Description: unique identifier assigned to a material sample used for extracting nucleic acids, and subsequent sequencing. The identifier can refer either to the original material collected or to any derived sub-samples.
Attribute.DescriptionJa: 核酸抽出とシークエンスに使用された実験材料に対する ID。採取された元々の材料，もしくは，そこから派生したサンプルを参照する ID を記載することができます。

Attribute.Name: subspecific genetic lineage
Attribute.Description: Information about the genetic distinctness of the lineage (eg., biovar, serovar)

Attribute.Name: Fhost
Attribute.Description: temperature of the sample at time of sampling

Attribute.Name: trophic level
Attribute.Description: Feeding position in food chain (eg., chemolithotroph)

Attribute.Name: urogenital disorder
Attribute.Description: history of urogenital disorders, can include multiple disorders

Attribute.Name: sample name
Attribute.Description: The sample name is a name that you choose for the sample, it works as an ID. Each sample name must be unique in samples submitted from a submission account.
Attribute.DescriptionJa: sample name は登録者がサンプルに付ける名前で ID として機能します。sample name は Submission においてユニークである必要があります。

Attribute.Name: sample title

Attribute.DescriptionJa: NCBI Taxonomy database，http://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/taxonomy に登録されている最も下位のランクの生物名 (適切な場合は species まで)。データベースに登録されていない場合，未登録の生物に関する情報をできるだけ記入してください。 DDBJ スタッフが NCBI Taxonomy に未登録の生物を申請します。

Attribute.Name: taxonomy id
Attribute.Description: NCBI Taxonomy identifier. This is appropriate for individual organisms, some metagenomes and environmental samples (http://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/Taxonomy/Browser/wwwtax.cgi?mode=Undef&id=12908&lvl=3&lin=f&keep=1&srchmode=1&unlock). If it is not in the database, enter a tentative ID (e.g., 1). The DDBJ staff apply a new organism name to NCBI Taxonomy, and then the tentative ID is replaced by an assigned TaxID.

Attribute.Description: Associated BioProject accession number (PRJDB)
Attribute.DescriptionJa: 関連する BioProject アクセッション番号 (PRJDB)

Attribute.Name: strain
Attribute.Description: microbial or eukaryotic strain name
Attribute.DescriptionJa: 微生物や真核生物の株名。

Attribute.DescriptionJa: 植物の栽培品種名。

Attribute.Name: ecotype
Attribute.Description: a population within a given species displaying genetically based, phenotypic traits that reflect adaptation to a local habitat, e.g., Columbia

Attribute.Name: depth
Attribute.Description: Depth is defined as the vertical distance below surface, e.g. for sediment or soil samples depth is measured from sediment or soil surface, respectively. Depth can be reported as an interval for subsurface samples.
Attribute.DescriptionJa: 水深・深度。局所表面下の垂直距離。例えば、堆積物や土壌サンプルの深度は堆積物や土壌の表面から測定される。深度は地下サンプルに対する距離として報告される。

Attribute.Name: elevation
Attribute.Description: The elevation of the sampling site as measured by the vertical distance from mean sea level.
Attribute.DescriptionJa: サンプルを採取した場所の標高。平均海面からの垂直距離。

Attribute.Name: environment biome
Attribute.Description: Descriptor of the broad ecological context of a sample. Examples include: desert, taiga or deciduous woodland.
